title: doll house font id
content:
I suppose it's modified to some extent but, does anybody know what is based on???

As always, thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830184705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/165d6e0652fa510f9ea331b5e282e191_4358.JPG)
author: dust

comments.content:
I couldn't find anything particularly similar, but the best candidate starting points I would pick are [Keyboard](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830184705/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/keyboard-rr/) from Red Rooster, or [Onyx](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830184705/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/onyx-mt/) from Monotype. Both have similar contrast and shape to Dollhouse, but both would need a lot of changes, particularly to the terminals. Onyx at least has some ball terminals.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks a lot for your response Mike... Indeed they are good starting points...

Let's see if anyone finds a closer match, although i doubt it.

Thanks again!
